message.content:
cs.SI, cs.GT, cs.SOC, cs.CYBER, cs.DS 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) - The paper focuses on social networks and their role in opinion formation, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
2. cs.GT (Game Theory and Economics) - The paper uses game-theoretic notions and tools to model opinion formation, which is a key aspect of this sub-category. 
3. cs.SOC (Computational Social Science) - The paper deals with social phenomena and their computational modeling, which is the main focus of this sub-category. 
4. cs.CYBER (Cybersecurity and Privacy) - The paper touches upon the strategic use of social networks to spread information, which has implications for cybersecurity and privacy. 
5. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper formulates simple games to model opinion formation, which involves the use of algorithms and data structures.
